item.title: FAQ Fixes
item.description: Back to Home Summary If you ever encounter some basic f**k-ups while building your blog (or something similar) and you can’t find the solution online, just come back here. Hugo doesn’t get much traction so it’s hard finding actual solutions :( The TRUE FAQ regarding fixes. Make sure to look at the date, though. This might go unupdated in the future. FAQ: A theme’s layout might override your home page. To counter that, just make an index.

item.title: Cheat Sheet / Summary
item.description: Back to Home This not a full guide. Not everything will be explained in full detail. These notes are based on TraversyMedia’s Laravel Crash Course | Uploaded: Apr. 26, 2022 and a Udemy Course my notes have references to .NET Core so this might not actually be helpful Stuff from laravel broken down Laravel > Structure Laravel > Concepts & Terminologies Laravel > Artisan CLI Laravel > Themes Laravel > Fixes & Troubleshooting Installation for Windows + Some Initial Setup Software you need…
